org.universAAL.ri.gateway

Class Session

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.universAAL.ri.gateway.Session
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OperationChainManager, MessageReceiver, MessageSender

    public class Session
extends Object
implements MessageSender, MessageReceiver, OperationChainManager
    Representation of a one to one link between 2 ASGs. It is in charge of connecting the communication layer with the Importer and proxies.
    Version:
    $LastChangedRevision$ ($LastChangedDate$)
    Author:
    amedrano, Stefano "Kismet" Lenzi

    • Method Detail

      • setScope

        public void setScope(String scope)
        Parameters:
        scope - the String representing the scope of this Session. At the moment the Scope is represented by the AALSpaceId of the AALSpace that we are connected to

      • getScope

        public String getScope()
        Returns:
        the String representing the scope of this Session. At the moment the Scope is represented by the AALSpaceId of the AALSpace that we are connected to

      • removeImports

        public void removeImports()
        To be called when the session is to be closed.
        Removes all associations in all proxies with the session, and closes those left orphan.
        Parameters:
        session -
